entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Temperature steady near minus 10. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Periods of snow beginning near noon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near noon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 3.
